name: Fly Missions
description:
Summary

This game is a cute roguelike flying action game! !
Players need to control the bird to fly with obstacles

Specific gameplay: The player controls the bird to move to the right and get as many points as possible
A variety of beautiful girls with different looks are waiting for players to unlock!

System


Click the mouse button to control the flying height of the bird to avoid obstacles and move forward. The more distance you can move forward, the more points you will get!

Score a certain level to unlock beautiful CGs in the gallery!
